description:
! 𝐓𝐨 𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐞𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐛𝐚𝐝𝐠𝐞, 𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐯𝐞 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐜𝐨𝐫𝐝 𝐧𝐚𝐦𝐞 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐦𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐛𝐨𝐱 𝐚𝐟𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐡𝐢𝐭 𝐩𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐞 !

ℬℯ𝒶𝓊𝓉𝒾𝒻𝓊𝓁 ℬ𝒶𝒹ℊℯ𝓇𝓈!
We have dug a brand new Den where we can hang out, celebrate, trade, share news, hand out rewards, give early access & most importantly, support each other!

To receive this reward:
- Leave your Discord name in the message box which appears after you hit 'Participate'.
- Join our discord: https://discord.gg/BrBKcKGdXg 

See you there!

🍀 ℐ𝓃𝒻𝒾𝓃𝒾𝓉ℯ ℒℴ𝓋ℯ 🍀
🦡 𝒜 𝒻ℯ𝓁𝓁ℴ𝓌 ℬ𝒶𝒹ℊℯ𝓇 🦡
name: Join the *Badger Clan* in our **Discord Den**
